text: du maliui nagtawa du mali ui soleul yangsig-eulo jusyeoss-euni illeo galodoe neohuiege geumgi hasim-i du maliui sukeos-inga animyeon du mali ui amkeos-inga animyeon du maliui am keos-ui taean-e issneun geos-inga hananim kkeseo geuleoham-eul myeonglyeonghasilttae neohuiga moggyeoghayeossneunga hananim-e daehayeo geo jishaneun jaboda deo saaghan ja eobs nani ideul-eun amuleon sasil-eobs-i baeg seongdeul-eul yuhoghadeola sillo hananim-eun joejieun baegseongdeul-eul indohasiji ani hasinila
